text: The Litro Gas Lanka Ltd. donated sophisticated diving equipment for the use of the Sri Lanka Navy Diving Unit, at the Lighthouse Galley today (29).Accordingly, the high  tech equipment worth Rs. 20 million was officially handed over to the Commander of the Sri Lanka Navy, Vice Admiral Ravindra Wijegunaratne.The occasion was also attended by the Chief of Staff of the Navy, Rear Admiral Sirimevan Ranasinghe, Director General Operations, Rear Admiral Piyal de Silva, Chairman of the Litro Gas, Mr. Shalila Munasinghe, Director - Sales and Marketing / Corporate Affairs, Mr. Chaminda Ediriwickrama, Senior Manager  Trade and Marketing, Mr. Prabath Vidanagamage, senior naval officers and sailors. Mementoes were also exchanged to mark the significance of this occasion.The Litro Gas Lanka Ltd. donated sophisticated diving equipment for the use of the Sri Lanka Navy Diving Unit, at the Lighthouse Galley today (29).Accordingly, the high  tech equipment worth Rs. 20 million was officially handed over to the Commander of the Sri Lanka Navy, Vice Admiral Ravindra Wijegunaratne.The occasion was also attended by the Chief of Staff of the Navy, Rear Admiral Sirimevan Ranasinghe, Director General Operations, Rear Admiral Piyal de Silva, Chairman of the Litro Gas, Mr. Shalila Munasinghe, Director - Sales and Marketing / Corporate Affairs, Mr. Chaminda Ediriwickrama, Senior Manager  Trade and Marketing, Mr. Prabath Vidanagamage, senior naval officers and sailors. Mementoes were also exchanged to mark the significance of this occasion.
title: Navy receives sophisticated diving equipment from Litro Gas Lanka Ltd.
